docs.lead_paragraph: Michèle Giliane Ingalls and Daniel Desmond O’Connor were married Saturday in St. Petersburg, Fla. The Rev. Douglas J. Hypolite officiated at St. Mary Our Lady of Grace Roman Catholic Church.
docs.snippet: Michèle Giliane Ingalls and Daniel Desmond O’Connor were married Saturday in St. Petersburg, Fla. The Rev. Douglas J. Hypolite officiated at St. Mary Our Lady of Grace Roman Catholic Church.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Obama has said ''every American has a right to affordable health care,'' but he has not said exactly how he would finance coverage for the 45 million people who are uninsured. The economic slump and the bailout for the financial industry may reduce the amounts available to cover the uninsured. On his Web site, Mr. Obama says his health plan ''will lower health care costs by $2,500 for a typical family by investing in health information technology, prevention and care coordination.'' Health policy experts endorse those goals, but say they are unlikely to produce such large savings.
docs.abstract: Pres-elect Obama has not said exactly how he would finance health care coverage for 45 million uninsured Americans; economic slump and financial bailout may reduce amount available for coverage; health care experts endorse Obama's goal of investing in health information technology while questioning whether it will result in savings he claims; drawing (S)
